summary: This new code file, about.html, is the About page for the software system. It introduces the user to Team Charlie's group project for the EECS 1012 Winter Term, which is a movie rating website. The page provides information on how users can rate movies using a 5-star rating system and how the server calculates and stores the data behind the scenes. It also instructs users on how to launch the server using node.js and mentions that user ratings will be cleared upon server restart. The file contributes to the system by providing important information about the project and its functionality.
